content: A `Textarea` is a multi-line input for large texts. It supports standard states like `isDisabled`, `isReadOnly`, and `isRequired`. A clear button can be added with `isClearable`.
By default, the Textarea automatically grows with the content. You can set `minRows` and `maxRows` to control the size limits. This feature can be disabled with `disableAutosize`.
Textarea supports validation with the `isInvalid` and `errorMessage` props.
Key stylable slots include `base`, `label`, `inputWrapper`, `input` (the textarea element), and `errorMessage`.
